name: Dungeon Crawler (Zizajer)
description:
This is dungeon crawler. A rpg game, when you can beat your random dungeons by one of three different heroes. Every heroes got different spell set. By defeating monsters you can level up your character, and collect items during game.

Have Fun !

Game was made in monogame framework. We created it as student project, in group was :

- Cezary Witkowski Main Developer/ Designer

- Marcin Kapelan Developer

- Piotr Sadza (Me/Zizajer) Sound/Graphic Designer, Partial Developer
